sig_info: Bullet-proof skin allows Luke Cage to become Indestructible and ignore all incoming damage for 1.5 to 3.5 seconds.
This ability can be activated again after a 44.92 to 26 second cooldown.

PASSIVE: Bulletproof and near impenetrable skin provides immunity to Bleeding.
+1066.67 Physical Resistance against non-Critical Hits.
ALL ATTACKS: Luke Cage gains 37.35 Attack Rating for each Debuff on the opponent.
LIGHT ATTACKS: 30% chance to Exhaust the opponent, reducing Critical Damage Rating by 67.43 for 10 seconds. The Opponent's Power Gain effects are also reduced by 25% for each Exhaustion Debuff on them.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 57% chance to Stun the opponent for 2.50 seconds. The chance to Stun is increased by 10% for each stack of Exhaustion the target has, up to 30%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Consumes all Exhaustion Debuffs to inflict Concussion, reducing the opponent’s Ability Accuracy by 25% per Debuff converted for 13 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflicts 4 Exhaustion Debuffs, each reducing Critical Damage Rating by 67.43 for 18 seconds. The Opponent's Power Gain effects are also reduced by 25% for each Exhaustion Debuff on them.
